July 21, 1923 D Shirebrook Contest
Shirebrook Contest 0 Test Piece Contest Shirebrook Contest shirebrook-contest
Own Choice from a Specified List
Colliery Cricket Field, Shirebrook, Derbyshire Prizes - 1st £22 and cup, 2nd £15, 3rd £7, 4th £5. March: 1. South Elmsall, 2. Kirkby Old. Choice of Sailor Songs or Lucia di Lammermoor. 6 bands competed
